title: Ep 307: Angler Man!
itunes:title: Ep 307: Angler Man!
description:
Bobby's heart is an abyss of love. Khalyla cheers for Hidilyn. Gil scrubs the butt. We talk Bobby's sci-fi, hypermobile Asian zombies, Olympic gold, leg scrubbing techniques, vulcanizing, and counting kisses.
